command.title: Resumen y Lógica de Nulos en KQL
command.description: Agrupa datos y maneja valores vacíos mediante la función case e isempty. [KQL Base Table: Bikestream; Group By: Neighbourhood]

part.desc: Calcula la suma total de bicicletas y asigna el resultado a la columna "Total Number of Bikes".
Agrupa los cálculos por cada valor único de la columna 'Neighbourhood'.

part.text: project Neighbourhood = case(isempty(Neighbourhood) or isnull(Neighbourhood), "Unidentified", Neighbourhood)
part.desc: Proyecta la columna Vecindario, reemplazando valores vacíos o nulos por la etiqueta "Unidentified".
Incluye explícitamente la columna calculada en la salida final.

command.full: Bikestream | summarize ["Total Number of Bikes"] = sum(No_Bikes) by Neighbourhood | project Neighbourhood = case(isempty(Neighbourhood) or isnull(Neighbourhood), "Unidentified", Neighbourhood), ["Total Number of Bikes"]
